title: RNA-seq analysis of differentially expressed genes between WT and KD ZC3H18 KYSE150/ECA109 cells.
summary: Small interfering RNAs (siRNAs) targeting ZC3H18 were purchased from Suzhou Hongxun Biotechnology Co., Ltd. (Suzhou, China), with an empty vector serving as the control (si-nc). ZC3H18 siRNA sequences were GGGGTGAGGGCTTCTGATCT and TCGTCGGAGTGATTATCTTCCT. These siRNAs were introduced into KYSE150 and ECA109 cells using DharmaFect1 (Suzhou Hongxun Biotechnology Co., Ltd., Suzhou, China).
